title: Up to $1,000.00 Off Immediate Move In On Select Units!
posting_body: ['WELCOME HOME!', 'Welcome home to Tribeca North Luxury Apartment Homes!', "Perfectly situated in the heart of Las Vegas, Nevada you'll be proud to call Tribeca North Luxury Apartments your home.", 'Our residents appreciate the easy access to freeways, local restaurants, shopping centers and entertainment, and we are conveniently located minutes from downtown.', 'Stylish apartments await you at Tribeca North Luxury Apartment Homes.', 'Our spacious floor plans were designed with your comfort and convenience in mind, offering amenities that are second to none!', 'Choose from our unique one, two and three bedroom floor plans that come with well-appointed amenities.', "You'll be thrilled at where you live!", 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Follow This Link for More Information:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 780 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Multiple Ceiling Fans with Lights', '- Ceramic Tile in Entry, Kitchen, and Bathrooms', '- Additional Phone Lines Available', '- Intrusion Alarm Systems', 'In All Homes', '- Pre-Wired For High-Speed Internet and Cable TV', '- Designer Lighting Packages', '- Sleek Black on Black GE Appliances', '- Triple Bay Windows', '- Custom Interior Two-Toned Paint', 'Community Amenities', '- Wi-Fi Internet Access Available at Pool and Clubhouse', '- Remote Controlled Access Gates', '- Two Athletic Centers With Cardio Center and Free Weights', '- Business Center', '- Spectacular Mountain and Pool Views', '- Outdoor Recreation Center', "- Children's Splash Pad", '- 24-Hour On Call Maintenance', '- Resort-Style Pool, Lap Pool and Oversized Spa', '- Planned Resident Activities', '- Outdoor Living Lounge With Ramadas and Barbeque', "- Children's Playground", '- Professional On Site Management Staff', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets Upon Approval.', 'There is a $350 non-refundable pet deposit, $40 monthly pet rent as well.', 'The pet limit is two pets per unit.', 'Please call for more details.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:8:30AM-5:30PM', 'Saturday-Sunday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Tribeca North Luxury Apartment Homes', '3825 Craig Crossing Dr., North Las Vegas, NV, 89032', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'PJ1h5uM2P8K']
